Calculate proportions of group k relative to reference group r

phi_pairs.Rd

Calculate proportions of group k relative to reference group r

Usage

phi_pairs(n_events)

Arguments

n_events

Event counts in group k and r

Value

A vector that has length of \(C^k_{2}\)

Examples

phi_pairs(c(2557, 186, 176, 467, 120))
#>  [1] 0.06780897 0.06439810 0.15443122 0.04482630 0.48618785 0.71516080
#>  [7] 0.39215686 0.72628305 0.40540541 0.20442930
